abilities.name: War Stance
abilities.details:
Mars generates a stack of War Stance for each enemy hero damaged by his basic attacks and abilities, lasting for few seconds (maximum 10 stacks).

Each War Stance stack gains Mars bonus [ad]physical power[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]). At maximum stacks, the [bf]physical power[/] bonus is [bf]doubled[/].

abilities.name: Dominion
abilities.details:
Mars slams the axe to the ground to create a fissure in a straight line, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit and briefly [db]slowing[/] them.

At maximum War Stance stacks, the [bf]range[/] and [bf]slow[/] effect are increased.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.details:
Mars gains increased [as]attack speed[/] and [ms]movement speed[/] for a duration. In addition, his basic attacks cleave in a cone, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Mars heals for a percentage of the cleave damage dealt to enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Omen
abilities.details:
Mars dashes to a target direction. Dash distance is increased when cast towards an enemy hero, but decreased when cast away from enemy heroes.

Upon arrival, Mars spins his axe around, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all nearby enemies.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Mars shreds the [db]physical resistance[/] of all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Conqueror
abilities.details:
Mars releases a powerful roar, [ad]fearing[/] all nearby enemies and greatly [ad]slowing[/] their movement speed for a duration.

Mars also gains maximum War Stance stacks upon casting this ability.
